org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.server

Interface ServerHttpExchange

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Wrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServerHttpExchange, AtmosphereServerHttpExchange, PlayServerHttpExchange, ServletServerHttpExchange, VertxServerHttpExchange

    public interface ServerHttpExchange
extends Wrapper
    Represents a server-side HTTP request-response exchange.

    Implementations are not thread-safe and decide whether and which event is fired in asynchronous manner.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
    See Also:
    RFC2616 - Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerHttpExchange bodyAction(Action<Data> action)
      Attaches an action to be called with the whole request body where the request ends.
      ServerHttpExchange close()
      Closes the response.
      ServerHttpExchange close(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Writes a byte to the response body and close the response.
      ServerHttpExchange close(String data)
      Writes a string to the response body and close the response.
      ServerHttpExchange closeAction(Action<Void> action)
      Attaches an action to be called on response close.
      String header(String name)
      Returns the first request header associated with the given name.
      Set<String> headerNames()
      The names of the request headers.
      List<String> headers(String name)
      Returns the request headers associated with the given name or empty list if no header is found.
      String method()
      The name of the request method.
      ServerHttpExchange setHeader(String name, Iterable<String> value)
      Sets response headers.
      ServerHttpExchange setHeader(String name, String value)
      Sets a response header.
      ServerHttpExchange setStatus(HttpStatus status)
      Sets the HTTP status for the response.
      String uri()
      The request URI used to connect.
      ServerHttpExchange write(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Writes a byte body to the response body.
      ServerHttpExchange write(String data)
      Writes a text to the response body.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.Wrapper

        unwrap

    • Method Detail

      • uri

        String uri()
        The request URI used to connect.

      • method

        String method()
        The name of the request method.

      • headerNames

        Set<String> headerNames()
        The names of the request headers. HTTP header is not case-sensitive but Set is case-sensitive. When iterating the set unlike getting the header value, you should make it lower-case or upper-case and use it.

      • header

        String header(String name)
        Returns the first request header associated with the given name.

      • headers

        List<String> headers(String name)
        Returns the request headers associated with the given name or empty list if no header is found.

      • bodyAction

        ServerHttpExchange bodyAction(Action<Data> action)
        Attaches an action to be called with the whole request body where the request ends. If the body is quite big, it may drain memory quickly.

      • setHeader

        ServerHttpExchange setHeader(String name,
                           String value)
        Sets a response header.

      • setHeader

        ServerHttpExchange setHeader(String name,
                           Iterable<String> value)
        Sets response headers.

      • write

        ServerHttpExchange write(String data)
        Writes a text to the response body.

      • write

        ServerHttpExchange write(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Writes a byte body to the response body.

      • close

        ServerHttpExchange close()
        Closes the response. Each exchange must be finished with this method when done. This method has no side effect if called more than once.

      • close

        ServerHttpExchange close(String data)
        Writes a string to the response body and close the response.

      • close

        ServerHttpExchange close(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Writes a byte to the response body and close the response.

      • setStatus

        ServerHttpExchange setStatus(HttpStatus status)
        Sets the HTTP status for the response.

      • closeAction

        ServerHttpExchange closeAction(Action<Void> action)
        Attaches an action to be called on response close.
